name: ENGAGE
abstract: ENGAGE is a metaverse platform designed for professionals. Through metaworlds, they can transform how people collaborate globally by harnessing the powers of immersive technologies

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Korean, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, French, Japanese, German
detail.app_release_note:
NEW
- Added an option for hosts to restrict access to a persistent Session so that only members of the owning group can join.
IMPROVED
- Implemented multiple error messages to communicate the different reasons why someone who used the Remember Me option must log in again.
- Added an icon to a user's name tag to indicate when they are in mixed reality mode.
- Upgraded the voice communication service.
FIXED
- Fixed multiple issues with avatar name tags.
- Fixed an issue that could cause multiple avatars to occupy the same seat.
- Fixed an issue with CFM video files that were uploaded before the v3.6 release.
- Fixed an issue that reverted object bubbles to appear on hover instead of on selection.
- Fixed issues with filter settings in the IFX library.
- Fixed an incorrect online status in Connections.
- Fixed an issue that could cause some menu screens to appear blank.
- Fixed an issue where locked sticky notes could still be moved.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO G2 4k, PICO Neo2, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4E, PICO G3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO Neo2 Eye, PICO 4, PICO Neo2 Wigig, PICO 4 Pro
